DataElement.preferredName: Molecular Analysis And/Or Immunophenotype  Laboratory Procedure Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a molecular analysis and or immunophenotyping was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Molecular Analysis And/Or Immunophenotype  Laboratory Procedure Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A laboratory procedure that involves the study of tissues, cells, and fluids using DNA/RNA analysis techniques for the identification of characteristics and abnormalities at the molecular level._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Immunophenotype is the characterization of a set of cells according to the antigens expressed._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Molecular Analysis And/Or Immunophenotype Laboratory Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Techniques for studying or analyzing the genetic composition and mechanisms of living organisms at the molecular level. May refer to the understanding and manipulation of genes (DNA).:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options:Immunophenotype is the characterization of a set of cells according to the antigens expressed.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory procedure that involves the study of tissues, cells, and fluids using DNA/RNA analysis techniques for the identification of characteristics and abnormalities at the molecular level.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
The characterization of a set of cells according to the antigens expressed.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
Executed and carried through to completion.
